rukus.text: 56|1|Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou,
56|2|meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng.
56|3|Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de;
56|4|dang da di zhendang,
56|5|shanluan fensui,
56|6|hua wei sanman de chen'ai,
56|7|er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou.
56|8|Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|9|Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|10|Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren,
56|11|zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de.
56|12|Tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong.
56|13|Xuduo qian ren
56|14|he shaoshu hou ren,
56|15|zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang,
56|16|Bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian.
56|17|Changsheng bulao de tong pu, lunliu zhefu dai tamen,
56|18|pengzhe zhan he hu, yu man bei de liquan;
56|19|tamen bu yin na liquan er toutong, ye bu mingding.
56|20|Tamen you ziji suo xuanze de shuiguo,
56|21|he ziji suo aihao de niao rou.
56|22|Hai you baixi de, mei mudi qizi,
56|23|haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
56|24|Na shi weile baochou tamen de shanxing.
56|25|Tamen zai leyuan li, ting bu dao e yan he huanghua,
56|26|dan ting dao shuo: Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhu nimen ping'an!
56|27|Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|28|Tamen xiangshou wu ci de suanzao shu,
56|29|jieshi leilei de (xiangjiao) shu;
56|30|manman de shu yin;
56|31|fanfan de liushui;
56|32|fengfu de shuiguo,
56|33|si shi bu jue, keyi suiyi zhai shi;
56|34|yu bei sheng qi de chuangta.
56|35|Wo shi tamen chongxin shengzhang,
56|36|wo shi tamen chang wei chunu,
56|37|yilian zhangfu, bici tong sui;
56|38|zhexie dou shi xingfu zhe suo xiangshou de.
